name: Castle Escape (itch) (Nel549)
description:
In this game you are a knight and you try to escape a castle full of monsters,they are everywhere so watch out,if you cross their road the will kill you,try get them from behing or sideways.The stairs are the exit.You have a limited numbers of moves so be carefull!   

 --Controls:    Press buttons to register the moves you want to make and then press start.Warning:You can only attack ones a run!

--Have Fun!
